Package BobcatLib.Hardware.Gyros

Interface GyroIO

All Known Implementing Classes:
GyroSim, Pigeon2Gyro
public interface GyroIO
Represents an interface for interacting with a gyro sensor. This interface defines methods for updating sensor inputs, setting and retrieving gyro data, and performing periodic updates.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static class 
    GyroIO.GyroIOInputs
    Represents the inputs for the gyro sensor.

  • Method Details

    • updateInputs

      default void updateInputs(GyroIO.GyroIOInputs inputs)
      Updates the gyro inputs based on external sources. This method is called to refresh the gyro's internal data.
      Parameters:
      inputs - The object that stores the updated gyro inputs.

    • getTimeDiff

      default double getTimeDiff()
      Gets the time difference between the last and current sensor update. This can be used to track the time between periodic updates.
      Returns:
      The time difference between the last and current update in seconds.

    • setYaw

      default void setYaw(double yaw)
      Sets the yaw value of the gyro sensor.
      Parameters:
      yaw - The yaw value to set (in degrees).

    • setPitch

      default void setPitch(double pitch)
      Sets the pitch value of the gyro sensor.
      Parameters:
      pitch - The pitch value to set (in degrees).

    • setRoll

      default void setRoll(double roll)
      Sets the roll value of the gyro sensor.
      Parameters:
      roll - The roll value to set (in degrees).

    • periodic

      default void periodic(Pigeon2 imu)
      Periodically updates the gyro sensor's data for a Pigeon2 device. This method should be called regularly to update the gyro's state.
      Parameters:
      imu - The Pigeon2 IMU sensor instance to update.

    • periodic

      default void periodic()
      Periodically updates the gyro sensor's data. This method should be called regularly to update the gyro's state.
